So many uninformed and delusions posters. It would be hilarious if it was so sad. Everyone just jumped on board chasing a dividend yield that was only accurate for the exceptional situation of the past two years and wonâ€™t ever return to this firm.

Watch the price dive when the earnings come out in line with expectations at 2.00-2.50EPS for Q4 with low guidance for 2023. The dividend will be substantially lower than the pipe dream numbers people have been throwing around here lately and the price will fall.
People holding bags will sell at any price as the dividend yield will be terrible moving forward thanks to the low expected earnings compared to 2021/22.

Anyone with a shred of trading experience will likely sell prior to the ex-div date anyway to avoid the 25% withholding tax on foreign dividends. Good luck getting that back as it is a song and a dance and even Schwab describes the 1116 form as â€œcomplex and complicatedâ€. Search google for those instructions.
